alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 18 at 3:19PM EDT until October 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama, Panhandle Florida and southwest Georgia. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Wednesday morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing
